rukus.text: When We ordered the Angels to prostrate themselves before Adam, they all did _ except Iblees (Shaitan). He is a jinn and he defied the command of your Lord. Yet, instead of Me (Allah) you accept him (Shaitan) and his descendants, as friends _ even though they are the enemies. Evil is the final end of the evil doers
I did not let them witness the creation of the heavens and the earth, nor the creation of their own selves. I wouldnÂ´t accept as aides those who lead men astray

That day He will say, "Go on! Scream and call (for help) all those you claimed were My partners". And call they would, indeed! But they shall receive no response! We shall place a barrier between them
The criminals (that day) will witness the hellfire, fearing that they will (inevitably) fall into it. They will find no way to escape
